LanguageData.PsychicAwakened.label: psychic
LanguageData.PsychicAwakened.description: This pawn's brain has been modified by archotechnology, unlocking psychic abilities.
LanguageData.PsychicBrainBurn.label: psychic burnout
LanguageData.PsychicBrainBurn.description: Neural instability caused by the use of psychic abilities. Can cause permanent dementia or brain cancer above 90%; causes the user's head to explode at 100%.
LanguageData.PsychicBrainBurn.stages.initial.label: initial
LanguageData.PsychicBrainBurn.stages.minor.label: minor
LanguageData.PsychicBrainBurn.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.PsychicBrainBurn.stages.serious.label: serious
LanguageData.PsychicBrainBurn.stages.extreme.label: extreme
LanguageData.PsychicConversion.label: psychic conversion
LanguageData.PsychicConversion.description: This pawn's brain is currently being adjusted by archotechnology - a painful and traumatic process.
LanguageData.PsychicConversion.stages.initial.label: initial
LanguageData.PsychicConversion.stages.painful.label: painful
LanguageData.PsychicConversion.stages.traumatic.label: traumatic
LanguageData.PsychicPowerAffinity.label: affinity
LanguageData.PsychicPowerAffinity.description: Psychic influence has overstimulated this creature's bonding instincts.
LanguageData.PsychicPowerClarity.label: clarity
LanguageData.PsychicPowerClarity.description: Psychic influence has increased this creature's consciousness.
LanguageData.PsychicPowerFortitude.label: fortitude
LanguageData.PsychicPowerFortitude.description: Psychic influence has nullified this creature's pain sensations.
LanguageData.PsychicPowerPremonition.label: premonition
LanguageData.PsychicPowerPremonition.description: This psychic is currently probing far-off minds to learn of their plans.
LanguageData.PsychicPowerShield.label: psychic null
LanguageData.PsychicPowerShield.description: Psychic influence has isolated this creature from further mental manipulation.
LanguageData.PsychicPowerShockMinor.label: minor psychic shock
LanguageData.PsychicPowerShockMinor.description: Psychic influence has overloaded this creature's brain, causing catatonia.
LanguageData.PsychicPowerUnity.label: unity
LanguageData.PsychicPowerUnity.description: Psychic influence has allowed this individual to share skills with a particular ally.
